journal-title-group.journal-title: Proceedings of the Annual Conference on Taxation under the Auspices of the National Tax Association

subj-group.subject: SEVENTH CONCURRENT CONFERENCE SESSION: STATE AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT TAXATION

title-group.article-title: FISCAL PLANNING AND STATE BUSINESS TAXATION: AN APPLICATION OF INPUT-OUTPUT ANALYSIS
